file_content.text: It was such a good plan....
Please don't kill me! I'm still young!
I'll do anything! I've got security codes for the Voidwolf's flagship!
They're on my personal datapad. Take my shuttle. It's already set to rendezvous with the flagship. Please....
Hand over the codes, and maybe I'll let you slink out of here.
You just bought your life.
What happened to "oh, I love the Voidwolf... I'm going to watch his victory..."?
Where's your loyalty?
I swear, it was just about money. I'm not an Imperial. I know what you do to Imperials!
You're not going to kill me, are you?
I'm just going to free your slave, steal your ship, kill your boss and leave you for the citizens of Corellia.
I'll let your people do that.
I've always liked your sense of poetic justice.
Ouch.
Haha.
I doubt that's much reprieve.
Ouch. Say, does anyone know if Corellians still put heads on spikes?
Oh!
Just give me the codes to the Voidwolf's ship. Then you're on your own.
No. I won't kill you.
Here. Here! Oh, thank you.
Can I just take a few minutes to, ah, gather my things?
Be grateful you've still got your head.
On the street, traitor! You won't profit from selling Corellia.
Run!
Ahh!
Watch him. When he opens his safe, we can kill him and collect the profits.
Sure. As long as you hand them to us after.
Never mind. I'll, ah, get out while the offer's good. The shuttle's just through this door.
You're pathetic.
Yes. [Kill him]
You can't buy me.
No sale. [Kill him]
Ahh!
The Voidwolf told me you'd make it here.
But you're too late. His flagship will be leaving Corellia's orbit momentarily!
If you want to live, give me his coordinates and flight plan.
Where is he?
He can't escape that easily.
I'll get him.
So, Captain....
Too bad. I'll just have to take out my aggressions on whoever's nearby.
Then I'll kill you instead.
Let's not be hasty.
I hear you've done a lot of top-rate work for the Voidwolf.
What would it take for you to make that relationship official?
He can start by kissing my feet and publicly proclaiming that I have the fastest ship in the galaxy....
Butter me up.
How public? Do you mean Republic media, or....
I'd rather see my ship turned to scrap metal than do the Voidwolf any more favors.
I'll never work for him!
Ooh. He'll be very disappointed....
What's he offering? I want a guaranteed minimum per job.
We could work something out.
Let me just draw up some papers....
Intruder! Intruder! Come immediately!
Have fun, Captain. I'll be joining the Voidwolf on my personal shuttle!
I will bear witness to his total victory!
